The tumor is present in the left frontal lobe. The tracts shown in a 3D interactive view at the right are obtained by using 150 variations of the bundle based on uncertainty simulation. We visualize the 75% of the resulting fiber variations. Based on this visualization, please answer the questions based on your judgements.

Q Based on the visualization, will you be needing an intraoperative neurophysiological monitoring to perform the surgery?
Q How confident are you about your decision?
